name: Potion Room
longDesc: You've entered a room that was clearly an alchemy lab, long ago. The stone tables are discolored by whatever concoctions were once spilled on them, but the glassware seems to have held up well under the assault of time.
shortDesc: Once an alchemy lab, glass beakers lie scattered about.

shelves.name: Dusty Cabinet
shelves.desc: You notice the dusty cabinet at the back of the room.

shelves.name: Cauldron
shelves.desc: You smelt the crusty, black cauldron before you could even see it sitting over-turned in the middle of the room.

doors.name: Jade Archway
doors.desc: Through the archway of dark jake you can see the Nexus.
